maqras.text: mujhe is shahar (makka) kee kasam
aur tum isee shahar mein to rahate ho
aur (tumhaare) baap (aadam) aur usakee aulaad kee qasam
hamane insaan ko mashakqat mein (rahane vaala) paida kiya hai
kya vah ye samajhata hai ki us par koee kaaboo na pa sakega
vah kahata hai ki maine alagaaron maal uda diya
kya vah ye khyaal rakhata hai ki usako kisee ne dekha hee nahin
kya hamane use donon onkhen aur zabaan
aur donon lab nahin die (zaroor die)
aur usako (achchhee buree) donon raahen bhee dikha deen
phir vah ghaatee par se hokar (kyon) nahin guzara
aur tumako kya maaloom ki ghaatee kya hai
kisee (kee) gardan ka (gulaamee ya karj se) chhudaana
ya bhookh ke din rishtedaar yateem ya khaakasaar
mohataaj ko
khaana khilaana
phir to un logon mein (shaamil) ho jaata jo eemaan lae aur sabr kee naseehat aur taras khaane kee vaseeyat karate rahe
yahee log khush naseeb hain
aur jin logon ne hamaaree aayaton se inkaar kiya hai yahee log badabakht hain
ki unako aag mein daal kar har taraph se band kar diya jaega
sooraj kee qasam aur usakee raushanee kee
aur chaand kee jab usake peechhe nikale
aur din kee jab use chamaka de
aur raat kee jab use dhaank le
aur aasamaan kee aur jisane use banaaya
aur zameen kee jisane use bichhaaya
aur jaan kee aur jisane use duroost kiya
phir usakee badakaaree aur parahezagaaree ko use samajha diya
(qasam hai) jisane us (jaan) ko (ganaah se) paak rakha vah to kaamayaab hua
aur jisane use (gunaah karake) daba diya vah naamuraad raha
qaum masood ne apanee sarakashee se (saaleh paigambar ko) jhuthalaaya
jab unamen ka ek bada badabakht uth khada hua
to khuda ke rasool (saaleh) ne unase kaha ki khuda kee oontanee aur usake paanee peene se taarruz na karana
magar un logon paigambar ko jhuthalaaya aur usakee koonche kaat daalee to khuda ne unake gunaahon sabab se un par azaab naazil kiya phir (halaak karake) baraabar kar diya
aur usako unake badale ka koee khauph to hai nahin
raat kee qasam jab (sooraj ko) chhipa le
aur din kee qasam jab khoob raushan ho
aur us (zaat) kee jisane nar va maada ko paida kiya
ki beshak tumhaaree koshish tarah tarah kee hai
to jisane sakhaavat kee aur achchhee baat (islaam) kee tasdeeq kee
to ham usake lie raahat va aasaanee
(jannat) ke asabaab muhayya kar denge
aur jisane bukhl kiya, aur beparavaee kee
aur achchhee baat ko jhuthalaaya
to ham use sakhtee (jahannum) mein pahuncha denge
aur jab vah halaak hoga to usaka maal usake kuchh bhee kaam na aaega
hamen raah dikha dena zaroor hai
aur aakherat aur duniya (donon) khaas hamaaree cheeze hain
to hamane tumhen bhadakatee huee aag se dara diya
usamen bas vahee daakhil hoga jo bada badabakht hai
jisane jhuthalaaya aur munh pher liya aur jo bada parahezagaar hai
vah usase bacha liya jaega
jo apana maal (khuda kee raah) mein deta hai taaki paak ho jae
aur lutph ye hai ki kisee ka us par koee ehasaan nahin jisaka use badala diya jaata hai
balki (vah to) sirph apane aaleeshaan paravaradigaar kee khushanoodee haasil karane ke lie (deta hai)
aur vah anaqareeb bhee khush ho jaega
(ai rasool) pahar din chadhe kee qasam
aur raat kee jab (cheezon ko) chhupa le
ki tumhaara paravaradigaar na tumako chhod baitha aur (na tumase) naaraaz hua
aur tumhaare vaaste aakherat duniya se yaqeenee kaheen behatar hai
aur tumhaara paravaradigaar anaqareeb is qadar ata karega ki tum khush ho jao
kya usane tumhen yateem paakar (aboo taalib kee) panaah na dee (zaroor dee)
aur tumako ehakaam se naavaakif dekha to manzile maqasood tak pahuncha diya
aur tumako tangadast dekhakar ganee kar diya
to tum bhee yateem par sitam na karana
maangane vaale ko jhidakee na dena
aur apane paravaradigaar kee neamaton ka zikr karate rahana
